DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the clinical utility of renal denervation for the treatment of refractory hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Renal Denervation in Patients With Refractory Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Systolic blood pressure of 160 mmHg or greater On 3 or more antihypertensive medications eGFR >= 45 mL/min Renal artery abnormalities Known secondary hypertension attributable to a cause other than sleep apnea MI, angina, CVA within 6 months Type 1 diabetes Others
